title: Ramaphosa voted in as South African President
text:
Ramaphosa voted in as South African President 2:45pm GMT - 02:01 
Cyril Ramaphosa has been confirmed by parliament as person to replace Jacob Zuma as South African President. It comes less than 24 hours after Zuma resigned, amid mounting pressure from his ruling ANC party. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Cyril Ramaphosa has been confirmed by parliament as person to replace Jacob Zuma as South African President. It comes less than 24 hours after Zuma resigned, amid mounting pressure from his ruling ANC party.
